name: Leo Clicker
description:
How many Chulas can you collect? Find out in this Echo fangame!

PLAY ECHO HERE: https://echoproject.itch.io/echo

Sprite and background owned by Echo Project

I do not intend to infringe copyrights.

CONTROLS: Left-click/tap on Leo or press the A button on an Xbox one/series controller to gain a Chula, Click/tap on Save text or press start/menu button on Xbox controllers to save game, Click/tap on Load text or press back/view button on Xbox controller to load game
